titles.title: To prohibit the discharge of a firearm within 1,000 feet of any Federal land or facility.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: 9/17/2002--Introduced. Amends the Brady Handgun Violence Prevention Act to prohibit knowingly discharging a firearm within 1,000 feet of any building or land owned or leased by the Federal Government.Makes exceptions for the otherwise lawful discharge of a firearm: (1) by a law enforcement officer or a Federal officer or employee; (2) at a shooting range; or (3) while hunting on Federal land.
